survey_name: Personal Finance Management App User Feedback Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather user feedback on personal finance management apps to understand user satisfaction, feature preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: Which personal finance management app do you primarily use?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for respondents to specify.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button with an optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which personal finance management app do you primarily use?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the app you primarily use?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the app you primarily use?

questions.question_text: Which features do you use most frequently in your finance app? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox with an optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which features do you use most frequently in your finance app? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you chose your current finance app?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights. Keep the response box concise.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you chose your current finance app?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your current finance app to others?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to gauge overall satisfaction.

script.question_text: Would you recommend your current finance app to others?
